verses.name: 2 Samuel 1:4
verses.text: And David said unto him, How went the matter? I pray thee, tell me. And he answered, That the people are fled from the battle, and many of the people also are fallen and dead; and Saul and Jonathan his son are dead also.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 1:5
verses.text: And David said unto the young man that told him, How knowest thou that Saul and Jonathan his son be dead?

verses.name: 2 Samuel 1:6
verses.text: And the young man that told him said, As I happened by chance upon mount Gilboa, behold, Saul leaned upon his spear; and, lo, the chariots and horsemen followed hard after him.
